mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, inner_query.* FROM ( SELECT n.notice_id, n.emp_id, n.title, n.content, n.importance, n.created_at, n.updated_at, n.view_count, n.notice_file, n.category_id, nc.category_name FROM notice n join NOTICE_CATEGORY nc on n.category_id=nc.category_id ORDER BY notice_id DESC ) inner_query WHERE ROWNUM <= #{paging.endRow} ) WHERE RNUM >= #{paging.startRow}
SELECT notice_id, emp_id, title, content, category_name, importance, created_at, updated_at, view_count, notice_file, category_id FROM notice where notice_id = #{notice_id}
